json.subject: Re: Reconnecting with GSV
json.freshContent:
Hi Stephanie,

Thanks for getting in touch. I would love to connect but want to make sure
you think it's worth your time.  So, let me summarize where we are:

   - We have *not taken any investments *so far, and given our cash
   position, it's *unlikely that we will in this calendar year.*
   - However, we are in the middle of an intense *reinvention *of the
   company.
   - Our ambition for 2025 / 2026 is to *move Multifamily from old,
   fractured, CRM-centric bookkeeping to Data-Driven AI through our
   Intelligence Fabric. *
   - The intelligence fabric is a unique architecture that combines:
      - *A Data Fabric *that creates a 360 degree view of the customers and
      prospects from disparate systems, and then
      - Activates them using an *AI Fabric* that delivers intelligent
      experiences

Here's a quick look at 2024:

   - *43% ARR Growth:  *From $4.42m ARR at end of 2023 to $6.32m ARR at end
   of 2024
   - *69% Operating Income Growth: * $3.68M to $6.23m
   - *541% Net Operating Profit Growth: * $0.32m to $1.76m

For 2025, we expect to be at $7M ARR by the end of Q1 2025, but there are
significant challenges as we *name, frame and claim a new blue-ocean
category; *move from a *single-product to a multi-product* company; and
reach for *$10m and beyond *over the next year.

Given the above, if you would still like to meet, please schedule at your
convenience: https://calendly.com/mg-hyly/vc-25

I look forward to connecting with you soon!


Warm Regards,


Munish

--

Munish Gandhi

Founder & CEO, Hyly.AI

*Changing how Multifamily Connects*

571.274.1876 | LinkedIn <https://www.linkedin.com/in/mgandhi/> |
https://hyly.ai <https://hyly.ai/journey-ai/>

Cut the Clutter: Subscribe to *AI Fabric for Multifamily*
<https://www.linkedin.com/build-relation/newsletter-follow?entityUrn=7196126741965193216>

> updates.
>
>
>
> Would you be available to meet later this month?
>
>
>
> Kindly,
>
>
>
> *Stephanie Schwarz *
>
> Senior Associate - Greater Sum Ventures <https://greatersumventures.com/>
>
> Let's Connect | Calendly <https://calendly.com/gsv-stephanie/30min>

nodes.name: Get emails from label and last request time
Not yet checked off, do nothing

parameters.content:
## Send labeled email to a Notion database
This workflow sends the contents of an email to a Notion database. The email must be labeled with a specific label for the workflow to trigger. The email subject will be the title of the Notion page, and a snippet of the email body will be the content of the Notion page. The email link will be added to the Notion page as a property.

### How it works
On scheduled intervals, find all emails with a specific label. For each email, check if the email already exists in the Notion database. If it does not exist, create a new page in the Notion database, otherwise do nothing. When the task in the Notion database is checked off, the label will be removed from the email.

### Setup
This workflow requires that you set up a Notion database or use an existing one with at least the following fields:
- Title (title)
- Thread ID (text)
- Email thread (URL)


Additionally, create a label that will be used to trigger the workflow in Gmail. In this workflow, the label is called "Notion".

Hello! If you're new to the channel, my name is Blake Bauer.

I've been running Facebook & Google Ads since 2017 and have generated over $20M in revenue for our clients in over 20+ different industries. 

My day job is building the best performance advertising agency in the world, JetAds.

How To Optimize Performance MAX Campaign (Google Ads)

In this video, I'll break down exactly how we optimize Performance Max campaigns at JetAds to maximize conversions and profitability. 

By understanding the right data, spotting key weaknesses, and knowing where to double down, you can turn a struggling campaign into a highly profitable one. 

So, if you're running Performance Max campaigns and want better results, this is the strategy you need to follow.

00:00:00 - Why Your Performance Max Campaigns Are Underperforming
00:00:29 - The First Step to Optimizing Performance Max Ads
00:01:24 - Asset Groups: Cold, Broad, and Warm Segments
00:02:46 - Setting Up Performance Max for Maximum ROI
00:04:29 - How to Analyze Asset Performance & Improve Ads
00:06:33 - Using Insights Tab for Data-Driven Optimization
00:07:48 - Cutting Underperforming Products & Keywords
00:09:22 - Competitor Analysis: Who's Competing for Your Ads?
00:11:01 - Scaling Strategies: Target ROAS & Budget Adjustments
00:16:06 - Final Checklist for Performance Max Optimization
